messages.title: Competent leadership
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap 'leads more into work'. Tax cuts for workers and savers.

messages.title: Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Bosses queue up to warn: Miliband will bankrupt Britain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Creating more jobs for local people and supporting our growing economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Karen Bradley focuses on job creation and economic support in the local area.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting the beautiful Moorlands and bringing more success to the area
Making work pay by continuing to reform welfare

issues.economy: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Bosses queue up to warn: Miliband will bankrupt Britain.
issues.governance: Competent leadership showcasing deficit reduction, tax cuts, more jobs, and new business start-ups.
issues.socialWelfare: Benefits cap 'leads more into work'. Making work pay by continuing to reform welfare.

images.caption: Karen Bradley with local people and a caption 'A strong voice for Staffordshire Moorlands'.
